content: During fiscal year 2022, we were very pleased with the adjusted EBITDA margin of 35-plus percent for the agency business in spite of gross margin pressures our sales teams experienced, Agency recurring revenue increased 11% for Q4 and 14% for the full year 2022. Our non-GAAP SG&A expense for the quarter of $75.9 million, increased to $11.4 million or 17% year-over-year. Consolidated FY2022 net sales grew to $3.5 billion up 12% year-over-year, which exceeded our full year outlook. Our FY2022 adjusted EBITDA of $167 million is an all time company record, exceeding our full year outlook and represents a 41% year-over-year growth rate and a 4.72% adjusted EBITDA margin. Year-over-year, working capital, which includes accounts receivable and inventory net of accounts payable increased $226 million, a 56% year-over-year increase. Your line is open.
